div.p: Meridional ( x axis; 60–90 °N) and pressure ( y axis; 700–1,000 hPa) profiles of May–September difference in (a) cloud fraction; (b) liquid water content; (c) longwave heating rate; (d) shortwave heating rate; (e) net heating rate; (f) temperature; and (g) specific humidity (2070–2099 average; experiment minus LENS control).
